description:
This beautiful studio apartment is the 3rd floor of a remodeled tri-plex in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Brewerytown. title: 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment In Harleysville With Great Amenities
description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit conveniently located in Harleysville, PA 19438. Enjoy a more private living experience in the upstairs unit of this 2 unit building. The main floor boasts two living spaces, a bedroom (which could function as your home office, or a guest room) and a full bathroom. There are beautiful wooden beams on the ceiling in the lower level. The kitchen is fully equipped with a gas stove, refrigerator, microwave oven and dishwasher. The upstairs is a large suite, with a full bath that includes a jet-tub, and ample closet space. The washer and dryer are also located upstairs for added convenience. There are luxurious new carpets throughout, and plenty of storage space. There is a lovely deck outside, and a shared patio space downstairs. There is plenty of natural light from the windows and skylights on both levels of the unit, including a lovely bay window on the lower level. The unit has central heating and cooling, and there are also ceiling fans in the foyer and in the upstairs suite. There is ample parking available on the premises. We know that pets are a part of the family, so we welcome your cats and small dogs (limit of 2 pets) for an additional deposit and monthly fee. Although the unit has plenty of storage, feel free to inquire about renting the shed on the premises. The shed is fully insulated, has electricity and heating. It would be perfect for added storage or as a workspace. This unit is absolutely beautiful and just waiting to welcome you home!
Date Available: Oct 1st 2022. $2,300/month rent. $2,300 security deposit required.
Qualification Standards
* Applicant must have current photo identification.
* Applicant's monthly household income must exceed three times the rent. All income must be from a verifiable source. Unverifiable income will not be considered.

title: Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, City Skyline View, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 2107 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 21st floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 6, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Coco Blue Spruce. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, or Barclay Prime. Dine out at Pietro's, Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by this community and the cost is separate.

title: Pet Friendly House Next To PENN
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023

title: Life Just Got Better! Commuter’s Dream! Townhouse in East Germantown
description:
Newly Renovated 3-Bedroom Townhouse in East Germantown! - Located on a quiet block in East Germantown, this newly renovated townhouse is calling your name! Downstairs features a nicely sized living room and dining room with eat-in kitchen. Upstairs features three wonderful bedrooms and a fully renovated bathroom!
Upon entering, you are welcomed into a large living room complete with engineered hardwood flooring and gorgeous large windows that light up the entire first floor! From the living room, you enter the dining area which leads to the kitchen tucked away in the back of the home. Both the living room and dining room have ceiling fans installed which create great air circulation for the entire first floor.
Please Contact US:  DixonRyan2895_GmailCom
The kitchen is absolutely stunning with custom white cabinetry, granite countertops, a custom tiled back splash and stainless steel appliances! This kitchen is absolutely perfect for your everyday cooking needs and comes equipped with high-end GE appliances including refrigerator, microwave and gas stove! From the kitchen, you are able to access a private backyard which makes for a lovely outdoor sanctuary.
The upstairs has three spacious bedrooms which include custom closets! These closets are perfect for additional storage and organization. All of the bedrooms have plenty of natural light and can fit a full-sized mattress with ease. The main bathroom is also located on this level and has been fully renovated with custom tile and a gorgeous soaking tub/shower! There is a single vanity and mirrored medicine cabinet which allow for plenty of storage!
In addition to all of the great features throughout the home, there is also an unfinished basement which can be used for a variety of things, including extra living space, home office, or additional storage.
Tenants are responsible for electric, gas, water, and cable/internet in addition to rent each month. Pets welcome with additional deposit!

title: Breathtaking 3 bed 2 bath Bella Vista townhome + garage, deck & more!
description:
705 Pemberton Street unit 711R – Available Now – 3 Bed 2 bath townhome with Garage
Amazing Bella Vista Location!! This three Bedroom, Two Full Baths Home with Garage Parking is available for rent.
Located in the Carriage Mews Condo Development this 1990 built townhome is tucked away off of Pemberton Street. Enter through the private gates into a serene shared courtyard with mature plantings including Japanese Maple trees and hostas. The first floor has a living room with a wood burning fireplace, beautiful wood parquet flooring, a mechanical/storage closet , a custom floor to ceiling bookcase, and french doors that look onto the garden courtyard. There is a very large eat in kitchen with a gas stove, a custom artisan tile backsplash, tons of countertop space and storage, a terra cotta tile floor, and a durable Corian countertop. Finally, there is a deep hall closet for storage that was a half bath prior. On the second floor, the study has a wood burning fireplace, shelving, oak hardwood flooring, and large windows allowing natural light to pour in. Also, there is a hallway full bath with additional storage space, and a washer and dryer
and a generous sized bedroom as well. The third floor includes a second bedroom, a full hallway bath with a skylight, and a small third bedroom with sliders leading to the East facing deck overlooking the tree tops and note there is the ability to add a roof deck also.
The garage is located directly to the right of the entrance gate and has some storage space as well.
The home is located in the Meredith catchment, a National Blue Ribbon school, and is a half a block down from Cianfrani Park, a neighborhood gem. Fantastic restaurants like Fiorella, Bistro La Minette, and Kalaya Thai Kitchen just a few blocks away as well as close proximity to the highways.

title: Newly constructed spacious house for rent!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for September 2022!

title: Fully Renovated Apartment For Rent - 2 BD, 1 BA
description:
** New Appliances Are Coming **
700 sq.ft. fully renovated apartment (Unit 2) in a West Philadelphia Victorian building. The unit is move-in ready and includes 2 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, 1 kitchen, 1 spacious living room.
The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertop, stove and oven, and fridge with freezer.
The floor is laminate for all rooms. Kitchen and bathroom walls are tiled.
The bay window in the living room faces Kingsessing Park providing an outstanding view over the park. The bay window in the master bedroom overlooks the backyard.
There is no washer and dryer on site, but there is a laundromat in the block.
There is no AC system, but you can install window units.
Special feature: 24/7 security camera system that covers all entrances and common areas.
The apartment is overlooking Kingsessing Park, you’ll have access to a well-maintained and thoughtful public outdoor space, featuring two tennis courts, four basketball courts, a semi-olympic swimming pool and picnic area. The building is conveniently located close to Clark Park, University City, University of Pennsylvania, CHOP and the University of the Sciences. Accessibility to local light rail is on the block!
RENT AND LEASE INFORMATION:
Rent is $1,350/mo. All utilities are tenant’s financial responsibility (electricity, gas and water).
The first and last payment of rent is due on lease signing as well as security deposit corresponding to two months rent.
Renter insurance is mandatory. Smoking and pets are not allowed.
INSTRUCTIONS TO SCHEDULE A TOUR AND APPLICATIONS:
To schedule a tour, you must complete a pre-qualification form. Request a tour clicking the button on this website or contact me so that I can send you the link.
No credit check or payment is required during this phase. After submitting this form, if pre-qualified, you will be prompt to schedule a tour of the apartment. If you don't pre-qualify, the decision is final and you won't be able to schedule a tour nor rent any unit in the building.
There are no exceptions.
After submitting the form mentioned above, if you are pre-qualified, you can submit your application. It costs $29.00 + tax and includes screening reports (credit and background check included).
MOST IMPORTANT SCREENING CRITERIA:
Applicants must prove to have an established monthly income 3 times higher than the monthly rent. They must have a minimum credit score of 650. Regardless of their credit, they must have an acceptable debt/income ratio. They should have a crystal clear background check and no prior evictions. We don’t accept Section 8 applicants. No smoking. No pets.
If you don’t match these basic criteria, we can eventually ask for a guarantor. A guarantor must have an established yearly income 90 times higher than the monthly rent. They must have an outstanding credit score and credit history as well as a crystal clear background check.

Welcome home to this well-maintained townhome in 100 Acre Woods, tucked away from main roads in the highly desirable award-winning Council Rock School District. This home sits in a family friendly neighborhood setting with a great covered front porch. Enter into the open concept sitting area/living room and dining room with tons of natural sunlight and beautiful hardwood floors. A beautiful eat-in kitchen with updated cabinets and granite countertops opens to the spacious family room. Brand new windows throughout the house as well as new large sliding glass doors lead to the newly installed deck providing even more natural sunlight to the back of the home. The main level is complete with a laundry room, updated powder room and garage access. Upstairs you will find a large master suite with a full bathroom and additional 3 spacious bedrooms with ample closet space. Finally, head downstairs to the finished walk-out basement that has endless possibilities and can be used as an additional living space, office, gym space and storage. This home also features dual heating zones as well as baseboard heating in the basement! This community offers low HOA fees and is conveniently located midway between shops and restaurants in Newtown and Richboro, within walking distance to Tyler State Park.
Serious interests only, great credit is reviewed.
